ComicInfo.Summary: Slingshot's father is kidnapped in order to force her to free a convicted criminal in return for his release, and the team goes along to help her. This leaves Maddie and Mrs. Chang alone at headquarters, where they are attacked by Widowmaker and her gang of super-villains.
